attributes.action: to issue full accounts of all taxes paid in 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like the govenment to issue  a list of ALL taxes in all the various forms that we paid during 2007 ( or the next available year ) to Government and Local councils.   A break down and a total - to be put in  Pounds and Pence,  IE. vat = Twenty Thousand Pounds - Fuel Tax = Forty Thousand Pounds- Income Tax - etc.
This should not prove too difficult  after all everyone has to budget their income and the government should be accountable to the people who pay.  All of this information should be available to us as a matter of course and with our right of freedom of information.

rejection.details:
When submitting an e-petition please supply full name and address information.
This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Department for HM Revenue & Customs.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
